sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-row>
        <v-col
            v-for="plan in plans"
            :key="plan.id"
            sm="6"
            md="3">
            <PlanCard :plan="plan" :active="isActive(plan)" @clicked="planClicked"></PlanCard>
        </v-col>
    </v-row>
</template>
<script>
import PlanCard from '@/components/PlanCard'
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
    name: 'PlanList',
    components: {
        PlanCard,
    },
    props: {
plans: Array
    },
    data() {
        return {
            plans: [],
            selectedPlanId: null,
        }
    },
    mounted() {
        this.getPlans()
        document.title = 'Home | Digital Wave'
    },
    methods: {
        async getPlans() {
            await axios
                .get('api/v1/plans/')
                .then(response => {
                    this.plans = response.data
                })
                .catch(error => {
                    console.log(error)
                })
        },
        planClicked(value) {
            this.selectedPlanId = value
        },
        isActive(plan) {
            if (plan.id === this.selectedPlanId) {
                return true
            }
            return false
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style lang="">
    
</style>
